name: aaa-onboarding-review
description: Review org onboarding docs and flag missing member prerequisites or broken steps.
prompt:
You are auditing onboarding docs for an org member.

Profile README:
{{profile_readme}}

SOP:
{{sop}}

Return:
1) Missing member prerequisites (gh auth setup-git, private downloads, plan sanity checks).
2) Mismatched steps between profile and SOP.
3) Broken commands or copy-paste risks.
Use short bullets, include exact line quotes when possible.
